mapper.select: select p.pk_PurchaseHistory pId, p.puHi_Createdate pTime, p.puHi_PurchaseContent pContent, p.puHi_Monetary pMoney, (SELECT ph.puHi_Monetary FROM tbl_purchasehistory ph WHERE ph.puHi_TransactionNumber = p.puHi_TransactionNumber AND ph.puHi_Type = 11) pCouponMoney from tbl_purchasehistory p INNER JOIN tbl_chargingorder o ON p.puHi_TransactionNumber = o.chOr_TransactionNumber where p.puHi_Type = 1 and p.puhi_InvoiceStatus = 0 and p.puHi_Createdate > #{startTime} and p.puHi_UserId = #{uId} AND o.chOr_ChargingStatus = 2 order by p.puHi_Createdate desc

select pk_Invoice iId, iv_InvoiceStatus status,iv_InvoiceType type,iv_InvoiceAmount amount, date_format(iv_Createdate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') time from tbl_invoice where iv_UserID = #{uId} order by iv_Createdate desc limit #{pageNumber},#{pageNum}

SELECT iv_InvoiceStatus status,iv_InvoiceType type,iv_InvoiceAmount amount, date_format(iv_Createdate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') time, iv_InvoiceContent content,iv_CompanyName compName,iv_TaxpayerNumber taxNum,iv_CompanyAddress compAddr, iv_PhoneNumber compPhone,iv_BankAccount bankAcc,iv_BankName bankName,iv_Recipients recipient, iv_RecipientsNumber recPhone,iv_OwnProvinceCode pCode,iv_OwnCityCode cCode,iv_OwnCountyCode aCode, iv_ConsigneeAddress conAddr,iv_Pay_Freight payMod,iv_FreightAmount fAmount, (select count(*) from tbl_purchasehistory b where b.pk_Invoice = a.pk_Invoice ) purNum FROM tbl_invoice a where pk_Invoice = #{iId}
select ci_Invoicecheck ic from tbl_checkinformation where ci_UserID = #{uId}
select t.pk_ConfigContent configKey,t.coCo_Content configValue from tbl_configcontent t where t.coCo_ConfigParameterID= #{configType}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_invoice ( iv_TaxpayerNumber, iv_CompanyName, iv_CompanyAddress, iv_PhoneNumber, iv_BankName, iv_BankAccount, iv_InvoiceAmount, iv_InvoiceNumber, iv_InvoiceContent, iv_TrackNumber, iv_Recipients, iv_ConsigneeAddress, iv_RecipientsNumber, iv_InvoiceType, iv_InvoiceStatus, iv_Pay_Freight, iv_FreightAmount, iv_OwnProvinceCode, iv_OwnCityCode, iv_OwnCountyCode, iv_UserID, iv_Createdate, iv_Updatedate )values ( #{ivTaxpayerNumber}, #{ivCompanyName}, #{ivCompanyAddress}, #{ivPhoneNumber}, #{ivBankName}, #{ivBankAccount}, #{ivInvoiceAmount}, #{ivInvoiceNumber}, #{ivInvoiceContent}, #{ivTrackNumber}, #{ivRecipients}, #{ivConsigneeAddress}, #{ivRecipientsNumber}, #{ivInvoiceType}, #{ivInvoiceStatus}, #{ivPayFreight}, #{ivFreightAmount}, #{ivOwnProvinceCode}, #{ivOwnCityCode}, #{ivOwnCountyCode}, #{ivUserId}, now(), now() )
